title: The Adventures of RJ the Mouse: The Lost Castle
description: Some adventures are born needing a special hero…This is one of those tales.An adventurous mouse and a wise owl journey through the heart of dark lands and bring light to those lost within. On this journey, not all who are lost need help…Some want to keep these lands in the shadows.Can this unlikely duo find the Lost Castle and Those Lost along with it?Pick up a copy now, join our heroes, and find out!
author: Robby Silk
